plugin.name: group
plugin.long: With this plugin you can group and tab windows

option.name: select
option.long: The key for starting selecting windows.

option.name: select_single
option.long: The key for selecting the current window.

option.name: group
option.long: The key for grouping windows.

option.name: ungroup
option.long: The key for ungrouping the current group.

option.name: remove
option.long: The key for removing the selected window from its group.

option.name: close
option.long: The key for closing all windows in the group.

option.name: ignore
option.long: The key for ignoring the group. If this key is pressed, you can do actions for a single window in the group only.

option.name: tabmode
option.long: The key for toggling the tab mode for the current group.

option.name: change_tab_left
option.long: The key for switching to the tab left of the current one.

option.name: change_tab_right
option.long: The key for switching to the tab right of the current one.

option.name: change_color
option.long: If you don't like the current glow color, you can change it with this key.

option.name: move_all
option.short: Move every window in the group
option.long: If one window in the group is moved, all other group windows are moved as well.

option.name: resize_all
option.short: Resize every window in the group
option.long: If one window in the group is resized, all other group windows are resized as well.

option.name: raise_all
option.short: Raise every window in the group
option.long: If one window in the group is activated, all other group windows are raised as well.

option.name: maximize_unmaximize_all
option.long: If one window in the group is (un)maximized, all other group windows are (un)maximized as well.

option.name: minimize_all
option.long: If one window in the group is (un)minimized, all other group windows are (un)minimized as well.

option.name: shade_all
option.long: If one window in the group is (un)shaded, all other group windows are (un)shaded as well.

option.name: auto_group
option.long: If you have selected some windows, this automatically groups them (Doesn't work with selection mode 'Normal').

option.name: auto_ungroup
option.short: Ungroup the windows if only one window is left
option.long: If there is only 1 window left in the group, it will be ungrouped.

option.name: relative_distance
option.long: The distance between the windows is computed relative to the window size. This allows you to have windows staying next to each other.

option.name: window_match
option.long: Windows that should be allowed to be grouped

option.name: select_opacity
option.long: Opacity of selected windows

option.name: select_saturation
option.long: Saturation of selected windows

option.name: select_brightness
option.long: Brightness of selected windows

option.name: select_precision
option.long: Precision of the selection (percentage of the visible window area which must be selected for the selection to be recognized).

option.name: fill_color
option.long: Fill color of the selection rectangle

option.name: line_color
option.long: Line color of the selection rectangle

option.name: mipmaps
option.long: Create mipmaps for thumbnails in the tab bar

option.name: untab_on_close
option.long: Untab the group when closing the top tab window instead of changing tab

option.name: autotab_create
option.long: Autotab windows with themselves on window creation

option.name: tabbar_show_delay
option.long: Time (in s) before the tab bar is shown after hovering the title bar

option.name: tabbing_speed
option.long: Tabbing speed

option.name: tabbing_timestep
option.long: Tabbing timestep

option.name: fade_time
option.short: Fade time for tab bar animations
option.long: Duration (in s) of the tab bar fading animation when showing/hiding it

option.name: fade_text_time
option.long: Duration (in s) of the text fading animation when showing/hiding it

option.name: visibility_time
option.short: Tab bar visibility time after tab change
option.long: Time (in s) the tab bar is visibly after a tab change

option.name: change_animation_time
option.long: Duration (in s) of the animation that happens when changing tabs

option.name: thumb_size
option.long: The size of the window thumbs in the task bar

option.name: thumb_space
option.long: The space between the thumbs

option.name: border_radius
option.long: The radius for the tab bar edges

option.name: border_width
option.long: The width of the tab bar outline

option.name: tab_base_color
option.long: Fill color of the tab bar

option.name: tab_border_color
option.long: Border color of the tab bar

option.name: tab_highlight_color
option.long: Fill color of the tab bar

option.name: tab_style
option.long: The style of the tab bar

option.name: tabbar_font_size
option.long: The size of the window title font in the tab bar

option.name: tabbar_font_color
option.long: The color of the window title in the tab bar

option.name: spring_model_on_move
option.long: Use spring model for the tab bar when moving the window

option.name: dnd_ungroup_window
option.short: Remove window from group after dropping it outside a tab bar
option.long: Remove window from group after dropping it outside a tab bar

option.name: drag_hover_time
option.long: Timespan (in s) after which a grouped window is activated if a window of another group is dragged over it

option.name: drag_spring_k
option.long: Spring Konstant used for slot dragging

option.name: drag_friction
option.long: Spring friction for slot dragging

option.name: drag_y_distance
option.long: Distance (in pixels) between the tab bar and the dragged slot for applying the spring model. If the distance is larger than that value, the model isn't applied.

option.name: drag_speed_limit
option.long: Mouse pointer movement speed limit (in pixels/second) for the spring model

option.name: glow
option.long: Enable grouped window glowing

option.name: glow_size
option.long: The size of the grouped window glow

option.name: glow_type
option.long: The type of the glow
